# deps/skia/src/jumper

set(SKIA_JUMPER_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/src/jumper")
set(SKIA_JUMPER_INCLUDE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/include/jumper")

file(GLOB SKIA_JUMPER_PRIVATE_HEADERS "${SKIA_JUMPER_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB SKIA_JUMPER_SOURCES "${SKIA_JUMPER_DIR}/*.cpp")
# file(GLOB SKIA_JUMPER_PUBLIC_HEADERS "${SKIA_JUMPER_INCLUDE_DIR}/*.h")

# list(APPEND SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_JUMPER_PUBLIC_HEADERS})
list(APPEND SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_JUMPER_PRIVATE_HEADERS} ${SKIA_JUMPER_SOURCES})

# set(SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
